description.en:
HELPICO is the first coin for help and charity.
In this era of a developing digital economy, the coin HELPICO is meant to become a tool of tokenization of humanitarian ideas implemented via blockchain technology.

status_updates.description:
Rubric: Ecological holidays and animal days
30.11 - World Pets Day
World Pet Day is celebrated every year on November 30 in many countries. It is dedicated to all animals domesticated by man and serves as a reminder to all mankind of the responsibility for "our smaller brothers".
More info
https://t.me/Helpico_Coin
https://helpic.io/Helpico/post/373 
https://www.facebook.com/helpico.helpico.1/posts/713335619616232
https://twitter.com/Helpico_Coin/status/1331965340142751745

Rubric: Ecological holidays and animal days
15.11 - World Recycling Day
The main goal of this holiday is to draw the attention of the authorities, the public and industrial structures to this topic.
The main task of recycling is solving the problem of limited resources.
More info
https://t.me/Helpico_Coin
https://helpic.io/Helpico/post/372
https://www.facebook.com/helpico.helpico.1/posts/707562806860180 
https://twitter.com/Helpico_Coin/status/1328999029947117568

Rubric: Ecological holidays and animal days
Holidays in November
09.11 - "We choose a future without radiation!" - under this motto, the International Day of Anti-Nuclear Actions is held annually on November 9 in the world.
More info
https://t.me/Helpico_Coin
https://helpic.io/Helpico/post/371
https://www.facebook.com/helpico.helpico.1/posts/700895807526880
https://twitter.com/Helpico_Coin/status/1326054839223246849

Rubric: Ecological holidays and animal days
Holidays in November
05.11 - World Tsunami Awareness Day was established by resolution of the UN General Assembly (A / RES / 70/203) in December 2015 at the initiative of the representatives of Japan.
More info
https://t.me/Helpico_Coin
https://www.facebook.com/helpico.helpico.1/posts/696371454645982
https://twitter.com/Helpico_Coin/status/1324042059028832256

Rubric: Ecological holidays and animal days
31.10 - International Black Sea Day is celebrated. On this day in 1996, six Black Sea countries-Bulgaria, Romania, Turkey, Georgia, Russia and Ukraine signed a Strategic Action Plan for the rehabilitation and protection of the Black Sea
https://t.me/Helpico_Coin
https://helpic.io/Helpico/post/370
https://www.facebook.com/helpico.helpico.1/posts/691978235085304
https://twitter.com/Helpico_Coin/status/1322074786718224384

Add the Helpico logo to your site, to a T-shirt, baseball cap or any other thing - show that you care about the future of our planet! 
Helpico - charity index in the world!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ngres8MKJys

Rubric: Ecological holidays and animal days
23.10 - International Snow Leopard Day
In October 2013, the World Snow Leopard Conservation Forum was held in Bishkek. This day was chosen as the International Snow Leopard Day.
